claim: Gerald Ford refused to be a presidential candidate.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Gerald Rudolph Ford , Jr.  (  born Leslie Lynch King , Jr. ; July 14 , 1913 -- December 26 , 2006  )  was an American politician who served as the 38th President of the United States from 1974 to 1977 , following the resignation of Richard Nixon .

claim: Gerald Ford refused to be a presidential candidate.
